meanings.sent1: She was disinclined to join the noisy party.
meanings.sent2: He is often disinclined to try new foods.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed disinclined to chase the playful puppy.
meanings.sent4: The old tree looked disinclined to weather another storm.
meanings.sent5: The student's face clearly showed he was disinclined to participate in the group activity.

meanings.sent1: I am disinclined to watch horror movies.
meanings.sent2: She is disinclined towards spicy food.
meanings.sent3: The picky eater was disinclined to try the exotic dish.
meanings.sent4: The artist's style was disinclined to traditional techniques.
meanings.sent5: The toddler's face scrunched up, clearly disinclined to eat the green vegetables.
